list.s: Florence’s greatest artists, Michelangelo at their head, came to gaze and marvel, sketching Masaccio’s trail-blazing use of light and visual depth as instruments of emotional impact, particularly striking in the broad sweep of his St. Peter Paying the Tribute Money.
